snippet.title: Neon Shift: Wishlist now!
snippet.description:
Neon Shift's steam store page is now up and ready for your wishlists! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2671600/Neon_Shift/ 

Wishlisting the game helps us out a lot and we really appreciate it.

Music is by Ben Vibrant, our audio producer/composer: https://twitter.com/BenVibrantt
